definition: pad/cushion/mat/to pad out/to fill a gap/to pay for sb/to advance (money)

son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)

sentences.english: The straw mattress needs to be aired.
The cushion is very comfortable and fits on most chairs.
sentences.chinese: 这个垫子很舒服，适合大部分的椅子。

sentences.english: The one metre border should be in a different colour from the rest of the matted area.
sentences.chinese: 比赛场边界内一公尺，铺上不同颜色的垫子。

sentences.english: I slept in the kitchen on a mat.
sentences.chinese: 我睡在厨房的一块垫子上。

sentences.english: Tack the cord around the cushion.
sentences.chinese: 用粗线沿着垫子边绷一圈。

sentences.english: Cushion can turn over changeover to use, answer to retroflexion every week, make wear away to distributing equably .
sentences.chinese: 垫子可翻转换用，应每周翻转一次，使磨损均匀分布。

sentences.english: Each person has a mat with weights and bands.
sentences.chinese: 每个人都备有一个垫子，并配有重物和腕带。

sentences.english: Ekwefi and her daughter, Ezinma, sat on a mat on the floor.
sentences.chinese: 爱克蔚菲和她的女儿，爱金玛，正坐在地板的垫子上。

sentences.english: Every evening she plumps up the cushions before she goes to bed.
sentences.chinese: 每天晚上睡觉前她都要把垫子拍松。

sentences.english: Spread many electronic pads around on the desk, just as you spread out papers.
sentences.chinese: 在桌子上摊开许多的电子式垫子，就好像摊开纸一样。

sentences.english: Our unit price for the hand-made straw mattress is 10$ per one.
sentences.chinese: 我们手工制造的草席垫子单价是每个10美元。

sentences.english: Bob body-slammed Jack onto the mat.
sentences.chinese: 鲍博将杰克平摔在垫子上。

sentences.english: She took the cushion and plumped it up.
Smelly wiped the clay off her trotters on the mat and came over.
sentences.chinese: 臭臭把蹄子上粘的泥土在垫子上蹭干净，然后走过来。

sentences.english: Have many tasks in front of you and use the pads as reminders.
sentences.chinese: 面对许多任务时，将垫子作为提醒器来使用。

sentences.english: Once inside, Vera put a sheet I had brought with me on the double bed.
sentences.chinese: 房间里，Vera把我带来的垫子铺在双人床上。

definition: pad/cushion/mat/to pad out/to fill a gap/to pay for sb/to advance (money)
